title: X Factor star Amelia Lily 'to join Geordie Shore for 20th series'
text:

Amelia Lily is reportedly set to join reality TV show Geordie Shore.

The 25-year-old singer, who hails from near Middlesbrough, is thought to have already began filming for the notorious MTV show, which is renowned for its boozy behaviour.

This won't be the first time that Amelia has tasted the world of reality TV after she spent some time in the Celebrity Big Brother house.

A source has told The Sun that Geordie Shore bosses are "made up" that the former X Factor contestant has signed and believe she will help "make it the best series yet."

They have cited that Amelia is "always up for a laugh" and believe she will "make great telly."

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: PA)

After finishing as runner-up on Celebrity Big Brother , Amelia proved that she is not "shy about saying what she thinks," and it is thought that her inclusion in the raucous Geordie Shore will ensure it is an "explosive" series.

There was further good news for fans of the show after it was reported that Chloe Ferry would be returning but without ex Sam Gowland.

Since splitting in May, there has been speculation that Chloe and Sam might give their relationship another go but sources have said that there was no going back and Chloe only signed if it was agreed that Sam would not be asked to return as well.

(Image: Mark R Milan/REX)

(Image: REX/Shutterstock)

The 24-year-old has reportedly "completely wiped her hands of Sam and she wants him out of her life for good."

Chloe was left feeling stressed after Sam appeared intermittently during the last series of the show and it reportedly "left her in a really bad place."

It is thought that Sam was "given the shove" after causing chaos and that he was "out of control."

(Image: ExpressStar)

(Image: Splash News)

The Sun has reported that another source believes the door is still open for Sam to return.

The insider said: "At the moment Sam won't be a part of the show but that doesn't mean he couldn't return at a later date.

"Things change all the time and old and new faces are introduced in and out of the show!"
